sentences.en: ...an attempt to get U.S. legislators to change the system.
sentences.cn: …让美国立法者改变体制的一次努力。

sentences.en: A legislator should be the servant of his constituents, not their master.
sentences.cn: 立委是选民的仆人而不是主人.

sentences.en: According to Saint - Just , only the legislator is capable of doing this.
sentences.cn: 根据 圣茹斯特 的观点, 只有立法者有能力这样做.

sentences.en: As a result, legislator employ various procedual devices to handle knotty problems.
sentences.cn: 结果, 议员们便采取种种程序性的手法来对付棘手的问题.

sentences.en: But when the legislator is finally elected - ah!
sentences.cn: 但当立法者最终被选出时 —— 啊!

sentences.en: His families were booming him for legislator.
sentences.cn: 他的家人力捧他竞选立法委员.

sentences.en: I shall be asked if I am a prince or a legislator, to write on politics.
sentences.cn: 有人会问,我是否是个王子或立法者, 因为只有王子或立法者才发表政见.

sentences.en: It is not true that the legislator has absolute power over our persons and property.
sentences.cn: 立法者对我们人身和财产拥有绝对的权力是不正确的.

sentences.en: Logically, at what point do the just powers of the legislator stop?
sentences.cn: 逻辑上, 立法者合法的权力应该在什么地方止步?

sentences.en: Luo trailed the winner, incumbent Legislator Chou Hsi - wei , by about 190, 000 votes.
sentences.cn: 罗, 落后于胜利者(任立法委员)锡玮, 十九万票.

sentences.en: Luo trailed the winner, incumbent Legislator Chou Hsi - wei , by about 190,000 votes.
sentences.cn: 罗, 落后于胜利者(现任立法委员)周锡玮, 十九万票.

sentences.en: So, the legislator shall make a definite and normative provision.
sentences.cn: 因此, 立法者必须明确、规范地制作法之适用范围条文.

sentences.en: The legislator is off to the land of Nod again.
sentences.cn: 那立法局议员又去了找周公.

sentences.en: The prince has only to follow the pattern that the legislator creates.
sentences.cn: 王子只是在遵循立法者创造的规矩.

sentences.en: The public angered by what a lady legislator said to close down the Consumers'Foundation.
sentences.cn: 一位女立法委员说要关闭消费者基金会而引起了公愤.

sentences.en: You can do science without believing in a divine Legislator, but not without believing in laws.
sentences.cn: 从事科学研究可不信上帝立法之说, 但决不可不信其法则的存在.

trans.tran_en: someone who has the power to make laws or belongs to an institution that makes laws
